channel.title: Rambling on Andy White
channel.description: Recent content in Rambling on Andy White

item.title: Hello World
item.description: The world of typed functional programming is a vast, mind-blowing, and often terrifying place. There are so many things to learn and so many rabbit holes to go down, it’s easy to get overwhelmed, and not know where to even start. For most of my software development career, I operated in blissful ignorance of functional programming - I happily wrote object-oriented and imperative code, mutating data and throwing all sorts of exceptions, and I was actually pretty content with it.
